t: Pepsi Co Buys Prebiotic Soda Brand Poppi For Nearly $2 Billion
s: March 18, 2025 - And while Coke and Pepsi will likely always dominate the soft drinks market - at least for the foreseeable future - they cannot ignore the shift in the market towards healthier living, directly impacting their product offerings. In 2024, the functional beverages market reached $134 billion and is set to reach $231 billion by 2033. This alone demonstrates the growing interest and shift to healthier drinks, explaining the multitude of new brands ...
